short_definition: A pleading used by a party with notice to other parties to have the case called at docket call of the first day of a term of circuit court to get a trial date set by the judge.
long_definition_html: A pleading used by a party with notice to other parties to have the case called at docket call of the first day of a term of circuit court to get a trial date set by the judge.
long_definition_markdown: A pleading used by a party with notice to other parties to have the case called at docket call of the first day of a term of circuit court to get a trial date set by the judge.
long_definition_text: A pleading used by a party with notice to other parties to have the case called at docket call of the first day of a term of circuit court to get a trial date set by the judge.
